content.rendered:
Smile Foundation participated for the sixth consecutive year in the Airtel Delhi Half Marathon 2015 as a “Change Runner” to raise resources for the education of children studying at Mission Education centres across India.

BlackRock, Amtek Auto Limited, JK Cement and Konica Minolta joined Smile Foundation in championing the cause, ensuring quality education for 130 underprivileged children.

The over 100 member strong Smile team including volunteers and employees from the supporting corporate ran for 6kms. as part of the Great Delhi Run, at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium in New Delhi.
